about_the_game:
Delve even deeper into the mystery of The Eyes of Ara. Hunt down lost secrets and explore the castle like never before with these beautiful, hand-drawn maps of the game's three primary chapters. Each map comes in both a full-colour poster version and a printable black & white version with ample space to note down clues, secrets, and hidden rooms.


Map List:
Chapter 1 - Abandoned Halls
Chapter 2 - Memories of Times Past
Chapter 3 - The Pursuit of Knowledge

All maps are A4 size at 300dpi (2480*3507), and each version is provided as both a single PDF and individual JPG files.

Installation Directory

Once purchased, the Castle Map DLC will download to your game directory. By default this is:

...Steam\SteamApps\common\The Eyes of Ara\The Eyes of Ara Castle Map
